name: Tessian
description: View metrics and charts based on Tessian data feeds.

children.name: Tessian - Constructor
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Constructor.
children.title: Tessian - Constructor

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) as count _timeslice

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "final_outcome"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge final_outcome takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by final_outcome
| sum(_count_distinct) final_outcome

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "alert_type"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge alert_type takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by alert_type
| sum(_count_distinct) alert_type

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "user"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

panels.title: Top Tiggering Filters (NOTE: Multiple Triggers Can Occur Per Email)

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "filter_name"
|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge filter_name takeLast)
| count by filter_name
| sum(_count) filter_name
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

panels.title: Flagged Emails - Email Was Not Sent

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "final_outcome"
|where module = "constructor"
| where final_outcome = "Email not sent"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

children.name: Tessian - Defender
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Defender.
children.title: Tessian - Defender

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "threat_classification"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge threat_classification takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count by threat_classification, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column threat_classification

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "user_interaction"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user_interaction takeLast)
| replace(user_interaction, "_"," ") as user_interaction_replace
| count by user_interaction_replace
| sum(_count) user_interaction_replace

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "threat_types"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge threat_types takeLast)
| replace(threat_types,"[\"", "") as threat_types_replaced
| replace(threat_types_replaced,"\"]", "") as threat_types_replaced
| count by threat_types_replaced
| sum(_count) threat_types_replaced

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "user"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user takeLast)
| count by user
| sum(_count) by user
| _sum as Flags
| sort by _sum desc
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "impersonated_domain"
|where module = "defender"
| where impersonated_domain != ""
| where impersonated_domain != null
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge impersonated_domain takeLast)
| count by impersonated_domain 
| sum(_count) by impersonated_domain
| _sum as Flags
| sort by _sum desc
| fields - _sum

panels.title: Total Warning Flags Seen by Users

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "defender"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge module takeLast)
| count

children.name: Tessian - Enforcer
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Enforcer.
children.title: Tessian - Enforcer

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "unauthorized_email_prevented"
|where module = "enforcer"
| replace(unauthorized_email_prevented, "true","Unauth. Emails Prevented") as unauthorized_email_prevented
| replace(unauthorized_email_prevented, "false","Unauth. Emails Sent") as unauthorized_email_prevented
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge unauthorized_email_prevented takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) by unauthorized_email_prevented, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column unauthorized_email_prevented

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "enforcer"
| where unauthorized_email_prevented = "true"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "final_outcome"
|where module = "enforcer"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge final_outcome takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by final_outcome
| sum(_count_distinct) final_outcome

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "unauthorised_recipients"
|where module = "enforcer"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge unauthorised_recipients takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| parse field=unauthorised_recipients "@*\"" as unauthorised_domains
| unauthorised_domains matches /gmail.com|yahoo.com|hotmail.com|aol.com|hotmail.co.uk|hotmail.fr|msn.com|yahoo.fr|wanadoo.fr|orange.fr|comcast.net|yahoo.co.uk|yahoo.com.br|yahoo.co.in|live.com|rediffmail.com|free.fr|gmx.de|web.de|yandex.ru|ymail.com|libero.it|outlook.com|uol.com.br|bol.com.br|mail.ru|cox.net|hotmail.it|sbcglobal.net|sfr.fr|live.fr|verizon.net|live.co.uk|googlemail.com|yahoo.es|ig.com.br|live.nl|bigpond.com|terra.com.br|yahoo.it|neuf.fr|yahoo.de|alice.it|rocketmail.com|att.net|laposte.net|facebook.com|bellsouth.net|yahoo.in|hotmail.es/ as is_freemail
| if (is_freemail, "Freemail Domains", "Non-Freemail Domains") as is_freemail_2
| count_distinct(message_id) by is_freemail_2
| sum(_count_distinct) is_freemail_2

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "user"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) by user
| _sum as Flags
| sort by _sum desc
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "unauthorised_recipients"
|where module = "enforcer"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge unauthorised_recipients takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| parse field=unauthorised_recipients "@*\"" as unauthorised_domains
| count_distinct(message_id) by unauthorised_domains
| sum(_count_distinct) unauthorised_domains
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
| where module = "enforcer"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

children.name: Tessian - Guardian
children.description: View stats and metrics related to Tessian Guardian.
children.title: Tessian - Guardian

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "misdirected_email_prevented"
|where module = "guardian"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge misdirected_email_prevented takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| replace (misdirected_email_prevented, "false", "Emailed Flagged") as misdirected_email_prevented
| replace (misdirected_email_prevented, "true", "Misdirected Email Prevented") as misdirected_email_prevented
| timeslice 6h
| count_distinct(message_id) by misdirected_email_prevented, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column misdirected_email_prevented

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "misdirected_email_prevented"
|where module = "guardian"
| where misdirected_email_prevented = "true"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge module, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "final_outcome"
|where module matches "guardian"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge final_outcome takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by final_outcome
| sum(_count_distinct) final_outcome

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "flag_reason"
|where module matches "guardian"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge flag_reason takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by flag_reason
| sum(_count_distinct) flag_reason

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "user"
|where module = "guardian"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id", "misdirected_email_prevented"
|where module = "guardian"
| where misdirected_email_prevented = "true"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge user takeLast, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id) by user
| sum(_count_distinct) user 
| sort by _sum desc
| _sum as Flags
| fields - _sum

$$logsrc
| json field=_raw "module", "trigger_id", "updated_at", "message_id"
|where module = "guardian"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge module, message_id takeLast)
| count_distinct(message_id)

|where module = "defender"

| count_distinct(message_id)

|where module = "constructor"
| sort by trigger_id, updated_at
| transactionize trigger_id (merge message_id takeLast)

$$logsrc

$$logsrc
